class.name: xbkTab
class.desc: The xbkTab class provides Tab Seletion options for xbkAPI web applications.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkTab.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkTab object if it has one.

method.name: addItem
method.method_desc: Adds an item to the Tab.

param.name: text
param.comment: Text that appears for the item.

method.name: remove
method.method_desc: Remove an item from the Tab.

method.name: setTabBgColor
method.method_desc: Set the background color of the tab when click on and off.

param.name: sTabOn
param.comment: Color when this tab has focus

param.name: sTabOff
param.comment: Color when this tab is off focus
